00040 /**
00041  * @file
00042  *
00043  * Validate defines required by cvmx-helper. This header file
00044  * validates a number of defines required for cvmx-helper to
00045  * function properly. It either supplies a default or fails
00046  * compile if a define is incorrect.
00047  *
00048  * <hr>$Revision: 78394 $<hr>
00049  */
00050 #ifndef __CVMX_HELPER_CHECK_DEFINES_H__
00051 #define __CVMX_HELPER_CHECK_DEFINES_H__
00052 
00053 /* CVMX_HELPER_FIRST_MBUFF_SKIP is the number of bytes to reserve before
00054     the beginning of the packet. Override in executive-config.h */
00055 #ifndef CVMX_HELPER_FIRST_MBUFF_SKIP
00056 #define CVMX_HELPER_FIRST_MBUFF_SKIP 184
00057 #warning WARNING: default CVMX_HELPER_FIRST_MBUFF_SKIP used.  Defaults deprecated, please set in executive-config.h
00058 #endif
00059 
00060 /* CVMX_HELPER_NOT_FIRST_MBUFF_SKIP is the number of bytes to reserve in each
00061     chained packet element. Override in executive-config.h */
00062 #ifndef CVMX_HELPER_NOT_FIRST_MBUFF_SKIP
00063 #define CVMX_HELPER_NOT_FIRST_MBUFF_SKIP 0
00064 #warning WARNING: default CVMX_HELPER_NOT_FIRST_MBUFF_SKIP used.  Defaults deprecated, please set in executive-config.h
00065 #endif
00066 
00067 /* CVMX_HELPER_ENABLE_IPD controls if the IPD is enabled in the helper
00068     function. Once it is enabled the hardware starts accepting packets. You
00069     might want to skip the IPD enable if configuration changes are need
00070     from the default helper setup. Override in executive-config.h */
00071 #ifndef CVMX_HELPER_ENABLE_IPD
00072 #define CVMX_HELPER_ENABLE_IPD 1
00073 #warning WARNING: default CVMX_HELPER_ENABLE_IPD used.  Defaults deprecated, please set in executive-config.h
00074 #endif
00075 
00076 /* Set default (defaults are deprecated) input tag type */
00077 #ifndef  CVMX_HELPER_INPUT_TAG_TYPE
00078 #define  CVMX_HELPER_INPUT_TAG_TYPE CVMX_POW_TAG_TYPE_ORDERED
00079 #warning WARNING: default CVMX_HELPER_INPUT_TAG_TYPE used.  Defaults deprecated, please set in executive-config.h
00080 #endif
00081 
00082 #ifndef CVMX_HELPER_INPUT_PORT_SKIP_MODE
00083 #define CVMX_HELPER_INPUT_PORT_SKIP_MODE    CVMX_PIP_PORT_CFG_MODE_SKIPL2
00084 #warning WARNING: default CVMX_HELPER_INPUT_PORT_SKIP_MODE used.  Defaults deprecated, please set in executive-config.h
00085 #endif
00086 
00087 #if !defined(CVMX_HELPER_INPUT_TAG_INPUT_PORT)
00088 #error CVMX_HELPER_INPUT_TAG_* values for determining tag hash inputs must be defined in executive-config.h
00089 #endif
00090 
00091 #ifndef CVMX_LLM_NUM_PORTS
00092 #warning WARNING: default CVMX_LLM_NUM_PORTS used.  Defaults deprecated, please set in executive-config.h
00093 #define CVMX_LLM_NUM_PORTS 1
00094 #endif
00095 
00096 #if (CVMX_LLM_NUM_PORTS != 1) && (CVMX_LLM_NUM_PORTS != 2)
00097 #error "Invalid CVMX_LLM_NUM_PORTS value: must be 1 or 2\n"
00098 #endif
00099 
00100 #ifndef CVMX_ENABLE_LEN_M8_FIX
00101 #define CVMX_ENABLE_LEN_M8_FIX 0
00102 #endif
00103 
00104 #endif
